Class JsonOps

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.JsonOps

extends java.lang.Object
    The class resoponsible for receiving and sending messages from and to the game server.

      • generateCreateMsg

        public java.lang.String generateCreateMsg​(int numberOfPlayers,
                                          int timeoutLength,
                                          java.lang.String fireworkType)
        Generates a string containing the JSON for a create game outgoing message
        Parameters:
        numberOfPlayers - the number of players in the game (2 - 5)
        timeoutLength - timeout length in seconds
        fireworkType - A string containing the use of rainbow cards
        Returns:
        A json message containing all information required to be sent to the server

      • generateJoinMessage

        public java.lang.String generateJoinMessage​(int gameID,
                                            java.lang.String token)
        Generates a JSON message for a join game action
        Parameters:
        gameID - The integer ID of the game to be joined
        token - The secret token of the game as a string
        Returns:
        A String containing the JSON used to create a game

        Returns:
